name: rumbustious
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
noisy, energetic, and rough: The party was a noisy rumbustious affair. The shouting, swearing, rumbustious chef returns for a new series next week.
More examplesFewer examplesHer husband is a rumbustious, arrogant and verbose character.The older folk are content to sit and watch the more rumbustious younger visitors.Daytime cafés frequently ease into more rumbustious drinking later on.
